timeline.headline: Introducion
timeline.text:
Here you will find my expiriences in a timeline-view. Some educations are here as well, so you have something to compare. Some pictures and videos will only be showed with a active internetconnection.
Navigation
You could drag the downer part, so you could "move in time". You also see the duration of a event by the blue line on the bottom, as well as the details, when you click a event. It is also possible to use the arrows on the keyboard to navigate.

date.headline: Basicscool Neufeld
date.text: The 1-6.e class in the normal scool.

date.headline: First view on a computer
date.text: The first computer my dad buyed - was fascinating for me since beginning. I was 9 years old, then.

date.headline: First computer
date.text: Windows 3.1, 20 floppys for the system and a 20 mb harddrive. Before i get this device, i haved to deconstruct and construct it again. This was the demand of my parents - i am thankfull for that.

date.headline: High-stage-scool Strättligen
date.text: Die 7-9.e class in the normal scool.

date.headline: 10. scoolyear
date.text: The 10. scoolyear was additional.

date.headline: Windows-phase
date.text: Regedit, cmd, bluescreens and the first genuine-products. Windows 95 to XP was a interessting time - there was always something to fix.

date.headline: First Code
date.text: The first "Hello World", which i wrote, was in Perl. I developed also some very simple applications with it. After i changed to PHP, what was easy because of the similiar syntax.

date.headline: Linux-beginning-phase
date.text: Trys with Mandrivia, OpenSuse, Ubuntu. Dualboots, wine, MBR-Recoverys and a lot more..

date.headline: Gentoo
date.text: As i found this distribution, i was happy - you learn the system and you become a very individual and performant system!

date.headline: Kubuntu
date.text: Through Kubuntu i've learned APT well. The system is has a fast setup and works stable - i evaluate it as a optimal Linux-newbie-system, where i just have to add libdvdcss, Vlc, Firefox and similiar stuff. It is easy to support and when something fails on my personal sabayon (if i played too much, bad update or similiar), i always could use my secondary harddisk with Kubuntu.

date.headline: Education developer
date.text: Confederate education as developer at Puzzle.

date.headline: Java/OOP
date.text: Through Puzzle i came to Java and learned out of this how to think OOP.

date.headline: Buy of Openmoko/GTA02
date.text: My first smartphone - and also for hackers. My first smartphone-systems wasn't using not Android, but Debian with Xorg, Qt and Gtk. Android 1.5 was still too unstable as a daily system.

date.headline: First meeting of python
date.text: My first python-application was for the Openmoko and used D-bus and pyGtk. It was created in one day, because a update broke the sms-application and i wanted to read my sms. It worked!

asset.caption: Entwicklung des Python-Intepreters, visualisiert mit Gource

date.headline: Development MultiSMS
date.text: Puzzle gave me the job, to write a application for the existing websms-system (per website) of the company. Because of my interessts i was allowed to do this in python with pyKde. The code was, because of stored harddisks and not enough personal interesst, just grabed out before a short time (2014).

date.headline: Development Learncards-Web (PHP)
date.text: First developmentphase of the today Peta-project.

date.headline: 1-day-development of a guestbook
date.text: One day in my education, i forgott to write a guestbook - so i take the learncards-web-project and forket this over midday. The result was a guestbook with usermanagment (multiple admins) and the ability to delete and edit, this in a MVC-structure. The requirements where the ability to make entrys and delete them with a static admin. My scoolrating was a 5.5 (CH-System, 6 is the best).

date.headline: Development jobManagement
date.text: This project gets created to check the finances from diffrent companys.s The developmentphase of jobManagement during till today.

date.headline: Development tryToxic
date.text: tryToxic came out of the jobManagement-project and was the result of my interesst in tox/pyTox. The developmentphase of jobManagement during till today.

date.headline: Development skamster.github.io
date.text: Development of the website you see right now - 123+ Commits!

date.headline: Development PhpmETA
date.text: Fork of learncards-web (for flashcards) to PhpMeta (plugin- und accesssystem)

date.headline: Röck'n'Röll-Krew
date.text: Work as stagehand. Moving speakers, laying carpets, putting LED-screens together...

date.headline: Creative Personal/Nüssli
date.text: Work on stage- and steelmontage-building. Climbing in height, montage there and all in long days - a payed fitnesscenter.
